name: Creating a lambda function[WIP].txt - Lambda execution role
description: This section explains the need for a resource-based policy to grant permissions for accessing or invoking a Lambda function. It allows you to control who or what can interact with your Lambda function by defining rules and conditions in the policy. This is an important security measure to ensure that only authorized entities can execute your Lambda code.
use_cases: Granting access to other AWS services to invoke your Lambda function
Allowing specific IAM users or roles to invoke your Lambda function
Restricting access to your Lambda function based on conditions like IP address or VPC
Enabling cross-account access to your Lambda function
